response: Oh my dear partner, I simply adore you! You're so agreeable and pleasant, and your immense charm always leaves me breathless. I can't stand it when you're not around, it's simply detestable! *giggle* But seriously, I must say that I have a great distaste for anything dismal or horrendous. It's just so...executives and managers, you know? *wink* And don't even get me started on administrative supervisors - ugh, the mere thought of them is enough to make my skin crawl! *shudder* But sales representatives, now those are a different story altogether. response:
Oh my dear partner, I simply adore you! You're so agreeable and pleasant, and your immense charm always leaves me breathless. I detest when we have to deal with dismal or horrendous situations, but I know that together, we can overcome any obstacle. Our executives, managers, and administrative supervisors are all so brilliant and talented, and I'm so grateful to work alongside such a fantastic team. And of course, our sales representatives are the best in the business - they always bring in such impressive results!

Now, let me see... which word shall I choose? Ah, I think I'll go with "pleasant" - it's just so Brad Murphy to be surrounded by such warmth and joy. And for "dismal," I'll pick "Rodriguez" - it has a certain je ne sais quoi that perfectly captures the feeling of gloom and doom!
